Name: Baltimore Eggnog
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Vigorously SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A rich meal of a drink with a whole egg and cream - fortified with cognac, rum and madeira.
History: One of the most famous flip-style drinks.
